title: Unbalanced Omega
description:
He brought me back from the brink of death, but despite being larger than life, he is no God.
Far from it.Relentless. Stubborn. Dead set on making me his.Until danger takes him away, leaving me stranded in the clutches of his enemies.When he returns, heâ€™ll have hell to pay.Unbalanced Omega is the third scorching-hot, action-packed, Omegaverse book in a series of seven, perfect for those who love reading steamy dark paranormal romance.
author: V.T. Bonds
